# hsi

Show top high short interest stocks of over 20% ratio.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/hsi [num]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| num | Number of top stocks to print | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/hsi
```
```
/hsi 4
```
